item.title: USA Today Enters Its Gen AI Era With a Chatbot
item.description: DeeperDive, a new tool that converses with readers, is an effort to beat the AI industry at its own game.

item.title: USA Today Enters Its Gen AI Era With a Chatbot

item.title: Onion CEO Ben Collins Hasn't Given Up on Print—or Buying Infowars
item.description: A year after relaunching The Onion as a newspaper, Collins visits Uncanny Valley to talk about why “going into something and not ruining it is bravery.”

item.title: Onion CEO Ben Collins Hasn't Given Up on Print—or Buying Infowars
item.description: A year after relaunching The Onion as a newspaper, Collins visits Uncanny Valley to talk about why “going into something and not ruining it is bravery.”

item.title: Americans Are Obsessed With Watching Short Video Dramas From China
item.description: How did steamy, short soap operas that originated in China become the hottest thing in Hollywood, seemingly overnight?
